metadata.title: Dimethyl sulfide Distribution data - Line P to Station Papa, 1997-present
metadata.description: Profiles of dimethyl sulfide distribution in the water column along Line P to Station Papa.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Estimating production of dimethyl sulfide in the ocean.

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Custodian will be leaving soon and has a large quantity of data not secured in a regional data centre.
Risk of Loss: High
Impact Justification: Data are related to a subject, location or species of concern within the scientific,  government or public community within the last 5 years.
Impact of Loss: Medium
Recommended Action: Obtain access from Dr. Wong and bring data to archives.
Additional Info: Data are part of the Ocean Climate program.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None planned

Access constraints: Private

Use constraints: Data will be released once quality is checked and are no longer proprietary.

Distribution liability: [unknown]
